channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Mart√≠nez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: U.S. says it struck another alleged drug-smuggling boat in eastern Pacific, killing 1
item.description: The U.S. military announced Monday that it conducted a strike against another alleged drug-smuggling boat in the Eastern Pacific Ocean, killing one person.
item.content:encoded: The U.S. military announced Monday that it conducted a strike against another alleged drug-smuggling boat in the Eastern Pacific Ocean, killing one person.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Moulton introduces bill to block federal funds for military action against Venezuela
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Democratic Congressman Seth Moulton of Massachusetts, who is sponsoring legislation to prohibit President Trump from using federal dollars to wage war with Venezuela.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Democratic Congressman Seth Moulton of Massachusetts, who is sponsoring legislation to prohibit President Trump from using federal dollars to wage war with Venezuela.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Heavy rain, flooding could soak parts of California during the holidays
item.description: A series of atmospheric rivers are threatening California with heavy rain and potential flooding during the holiday week.
item.content:encoded: A series of atmospheric rivers are threatening California with heavy rain and potential flooding during the holiday week.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Stark

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: U.S. says it struck another alleged drug-smuggling boat in the eastern Pacific, a judge rules deported Venezuelans be returned to the U.S., top Heritage Foundation officials leaving amid rift in GOP.
item.content:encoded: U.S. says it struck another alleged drug-smuggling boat in the eastern Pacific, a judge rules deported Venezuelans be returned to the U.S., top Heritage Foundation officials leaving amid rift in GOP.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: More than 122 million Americans expected to travel this holiday season, AAA says
item.description: AAA predicts more than 122 million Americans will travel during the end-of-year holiday period, a slight increase over 2024's record number.
item.content:encoded: AAA predicts more than 122 million Americans will travel during the end-of-year holiday period, a slight increase over 2024's record number.
item.dc:creator: Joel Rose

item.title: Reindeer bring holiday magic to Illinois ranch year round
item.description: Reindeer typically live in colder climates. However, they are a big hit on a ranch in central Illinois where they live year-round and become a special attraction during the holiday season.
item.content:encoded: Reindeer typically live in colder climates. However, they are a big hit on a ranch in central Illinois where they live year-round and become a special attraction during the holiday season.
item.dc:creator: Adelyn Mui

item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to return deported Venezuelans to the U.S.
item.description: A federal judge ordered the Trump administration to return deported Venezuelans to the U.S. or give them another chance at legal remedies from abroad.
item.content:encoded: A federal judge ordered the Trump administration to return deported Venezuelans to the U.S. or give them another chance at legal remedies from abroad.
item.dc:creator: Ximena Bustillo

item.title: Palestinians says Israel is demolishing homes near Jerusalem, displacing hundreds
item.description: Palestinians say Israel has demolished hundreds of homes near Jerusalem, displacing hundreds of Palestinians as new Jewish settlements are greenlit in the West Bank.
item.content:encoded: Palestinians say Israel has demolished hundreds of homes near Jerusalem, displacing hundreds of Palestinians as new Jewish settlements are greenlit in the West Bank.
item.dc:creator: Hadeel Al-Shalchi

item.title: Habitat for Humanity is known for building homes. Costs have some chapters pivoting
item.description: Some Habitat for Humanity chapters are altering their model and using factory-built housing on some of their sites. It's a change for the organization and for its volunteers.
item.content:encoded: Some Habitat for Humanity chapters are altering their model and using factory-built housing on some of their sites. It's a change for the organization and for its volunteers.
item.dc:creator: Addie Costello

item.title: The best audiobooks of 2025
item.description: As the year comes to a close, we take a look at some of the most popular audiobooks of 2025.
item.content:encoded: As the year comes to a close, we take a look at some of the most popular audiobooks of 2025.
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong
